description: A crowd favourite, these delicious pork belly skewers are the perfect finger food to serve for pre-dinner canapes or a laid-back lunch.
name: Mini Pork Belly Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut pork slices into 3cm pieces and roughly chop crackling. Thread 1 cucumber ribbon and a piece of pork onto each of the 16 small bamboo skewers. Drizzle over reserved sauce mixture. Scatter over chilli, crackling and coriander, then serve.
